text: General Yun Chi-wang (윤치왕, 尹致旺) (February 17, 1895 – December 21, 1982) was a South Korean politicians, solder and gynecologist. He was the half brother of Yun Chi-ho, uncle of Yun Poson, 4th president of South Korea. == Other websites == * Yun Chi-wang at Korean historical person information * 군진의학의 토대를 다진 - 윤치왕 의사신문 2011.07.07 Category:1895 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Korean activists Category:Korean educators Category:South Korean politicians Category:Anti-communists Category:Korean politicians Category:South Korean autobiographers Category:Gynecologists
title: Yun Chi-wang
